channel.title: Adding items into shop!
channel.description:
well ig ot a shop keeper (id 551) and i want to add items to the shop... the items i wanna add are full bandos.
if any1 could give me the code and where to put it, that would be awesome thnx.
=D
willing to rep++

item.title: Adding items into shop!
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

[quote=“madgamer, post:2, topic:166485”]add this bit to your shops.cfg file

shop = 100	Bandos_Shop	1	1	15348	1000	15349	1000	15350	1000

the 2nd part of it i dont see anything that says: else if (NPCID == 587) { //herblore supplies
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 14;
}
now find this in your client.java (yours may be different, just check the format)

else if (NPCID == 587) { //herblore supplies PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 14; }

and put this part in…

else if (NPCID == 551) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 100; }

that should do it [/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2007, 02:16:28 PM[/size][hr]1 error… client.java:17288: ‘else’ without ‘if’

some more but im lazy lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2007, 02:49:25 PM[/size][hr]some1…

Read full topic

item.title: Adding items into shop!
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

add this bit to your shops.cfg file

shop = 100	Bandos_Shop	1	1	15348	1000	15349	1000	15350	1000

now find this in your client.java (yours may be different, just check the format)

else if (NPCID == 587) { //herblore supplies PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 14; }

and put this part in…

else if (NPCID == 551) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 100; }

that should do it

Read full topic
